title: Number of cats in the U.S. 2000 to 2017
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of cats in millions, containing a total of 9 data points.
In general Number of cats in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of cats in millions is gradually increasing from 2000 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2006, slightly decreasing from 2006 to 2008, and lastly roughly increasing from 2008 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2002 and 2004.
The highest Number of cats in millions, of value 95.6 was reached at Year 2013
The lowest Number of cats in millions, of value 73.0 was reported at Year 2000
